items.sentence: There's not much chance that Tom will want to do that.
Why don't you have a try at convincing Tom to do that?
That's the way it works, and the only way it can work.
Tom already speaks French better than I speak English.
That's not the main reason that Tom shouldn't do that.
I know that someone in your position wouldn't do that.
I'd like to know what time you're planning to do that.
A person with a BMI of 30 or more is considered obese.
Tom banged on the door, hoping someone would hear him.
The man who broke into Tom's house stole Tom's violin.
